name: DTREE_ANSWER
description: This table contains information about decision tree answer records.

columns.name: DTREE_ANSWER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the answer record.

columns.name: ABANDONING_PROSPECT_ID
columns.description: Stores the prospective patient record that is associated with this questionnaire answer record.

columns.name: ST_DEPARTMENT_ID_EXTERNAL_NAME
columns.description: The external name of the department record. This is often used in patient correspondence such as reminder letters.
